numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There is a higher percent of players of color than coaches of color.
2. The highest percents are in the WNBA and the NBA.
3. The lowest percents are in the MLB.
4. I wonder why the highest percents of diversity are among the players and not among the coaches.
5. I wonder why there is a higher diversity in the NBA.
6. This situation can impact me in many ways.
7. This situation can impact my community in many ways.
8. This situation can influence young players.
9. These young players try to become professional athletes.
10. This situation can help these young players to know what chance they have to become a professional athlete.
11. This graph shows multiple percentages about diversity in professional sports.
12. The headline is: Diversity of players and coaches in professional sports leagues.
